content.prompt_es:
Fill in the blanks with the correct form of the word given in parentheses.

Base words: (1) IMPORT, (2) EDUCATE, (3) DEVELOP, (4) GRADUATE, (5) COMPETE
content.main_text: Education is a vital part of our lives. The (1)___ (IMPORT) of learning cannot be underestimated. Nowadays, many students choose to pursue higher (2)___ (EDUCATE) at universities around the world. These institutions not only offer academic knowledge but also (3)___ (DEVELOP) skills that are essential for future careers. The (4)___ (GRADUATE) process is challenging, but it prepares students for the (5)___ (COMPETE) job market.

content.prompt_es:
Fill in the gaps with the correct form of the word given in brackets.

Base words: (1) POLLUTE, (2) REDUCE, (3) RECYCLE, (4) ACT, (5) RESPONSIBLE
content.main_text: The increase in (1)___ (pollute) in the air and water is a serious problem. People need to focus on (2)___ (reduce) waste to help our planet. Many communities are promoting (3)___ (recycle) programs to encourage citizens to reuse materials. Climate change is a result of human (4)___ (act), and we must take (5)___ (responsible) for our actions.
content.explanation:
(1) La palabra 'pollution' es el sustantivo que se refiere a la contaminación.
(2) La palabra 'reduction' es el sustantivo que describe el acto de reducir.
(3) La palabra 'recycling' es el sustantivo que describe el proceso de reciclaje.
(4) La palabra 'action' es el sustantivo que se refiere a la acción realizada por las personas.
(5) La palabra 'responsibility' es el sustantivo que implica la responsabilidad que tenemos.
